steps.title: Activity Center
steps.text: Here you can track all your running simulations, recent activity, and completed tasks. If you want to check the results once these are ready, you will find more details in the Activity Overview on the Project card.
By clicking on the Bell, you will you see notifications about which Projects, Credits and Organizations have been shared with you.
Under the question mark, you will find Manuals, Support and ways to give us Feedback. It also provides quick access to other Guided Tours.
The User Menu gives you access to Your Account, Billing Center, Preferences, Organizations and more.

plans.name: Plans
plans.description: All you need to know about Plan handling

steps.title: Start A new Plan
steps.text: Clicking on this (+) button a window with all the Plans available will pop up.

steps.title: Precomputed Plans
steps.text: These plans have been available in prior versions and continue to be free of charge. They utilize pre-installed models and do not support personalization. Please select these for basic stimulation optimization.

steps.title: Personalized Plans
steps.text: These plans support personalization and allow for customized models. Running the simulations required for personalized optimization will incur charges. Choose these plans for advanced stimulation optimization. If you want to learn how to purchase credits, follow the 'Buy Credits' Guided Tour.

steps.title: Plans
steps.text: The Plans you create and the ones shared with you will be listed here.

steps.title: Filters
steps.text:
These filters allows you to display a better organized Dashboard.
You can filter by with with whom the resources is Shared with and also Tags if you assign them.

steps.title: Filters and Search
steps.text:
This tool allows you to search and filter Plans.
You can search and filter by:
- Title, description, owner, id...
- Tags
- Shared with

steps.title: More options button
steps.text: On the Plan card, you can use the three dots button to access more information and operation on the Plan.

steps.title: Update Services
steps.text: On the Plan card, you can use the Update button to update the corresponding service to its latest version.

steps.title: Credits
steps.text: In order to run personalized TI plans, Credits are required. In the next steps you will learn how to purchase them.

steps.title: Credits Indicator
steps.text: By clicking on the Credits indicator, you will you see the number of available Credits. Click the three dots to access the Billing Center.

steps.title: Credit Accounts
steps.text: This lists the Credit Accounts you have access to. Apart from your own Account, the list also includes Credit Accounts that were shared with you.

steps.title: Buy Credits
steps.text: There are two ways to add Credits to your Credit Account: you can set up an auto-top-up procedure or make a one-time payment.

steps.title: Auto-Recharge
steps.text: Keep your balance running smoothly by automatically setting your Credits to be topped up when it runs low. Before the automated top-up function can be activated, you must add a payment method.

steps.title: One-Time payment
steps.text: You can top up your Credits with a one-off, non-recurring payment. After the payment is made, the new Credits will be added to your Credit Account. The payment method can be saved for future top ups.
Once the payment is validated, the Credits will be added to your Credit Account and they will be ready to be used.
